headline: Beyond Meat Plummets After Debt Swap Massively Dilutes Shareholders
summary: Beyond Meat exploded after its public debut six years ago, with the company once valued at over $14 billion.  Beyond Meat now has a market cap of about $80 million.  Beyond Meat has no buy ratings, five holds and six sells, according to data compiled by Bloomberg.
